title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Ken Matthews guest hosts while Rush deals with some oral surgery. Gen. Flynn exonerated! Congressman Jim Jordan calls. SD Gov. Kristi Noem’s resistance to total shutdown gets support. CA governor shuts down beaches. Pelosi puts together committee. New Whitmer protest. Shouldn't Comey be in jail? Politicians aren't for the people. Caller asks why the right is constantly bullied by the left. Political coverups and the brave individuals who fight them.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Gen. Flynn’s attorney Sidney Powell calls to discuss the case and why the media has lost all credibility. Biden sexual assault claims. CA beach shutdown. Weak-kneed flippity-floppity leadership. Caller shares one-sided town hall for teachers in Illinois. Reopening Disney: put a mask on Mickey!

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Ken Matthews recommends a book for kids. Caller brings up Sweden’s handling of the virus and why it’s not socialism. Amazon, Walmart, and FedEx employee walkout over safety conditions, but a caller disagrees. How tech giants are profiting during COVID. SD Gov. Kristi Noem joins the show to discuss the proactive measures her state is taking and why.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
